# ZeroDue - Professional Invoice Generator & Invoicing Software

> **Invoice faster. Get paid faster.**  
> ZeroDue is purpose-built invoicing software for freelancers, contractors, and small businesses. Create professional invoices in seconds, send with embedded payment links, and automate reminders.

## Overview

**Product**: ZeroDue  
**Category**: Invoicing software, billing platform, invoice generator  
**Region**: Global (UK, US, EU, Australia focus)  
**Founded**: 2024  
**Website**: https://www.zerodue.co

## What ZeroDue does

ZeroDue is a modern invoicing platform that helps businesses:
- Create professional invoices with customizable templates
- Send invoices via email with payment links
- Accept payments (credit card, bank transfer, PayPal)
- Automate payment reminders
- Track invoice status (draft, sent, viewed, paid, overdue)
- Manage clients and recurring billing
- Generate financial reports and analytics
- Handle multi-currency and tax compliance (VAT, GST, sales tax)

## Key differentiators

**vs AI invoice generators (ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini)**:  
AI tools generate text but lack structure, numbering, tracking, payment processing, and compliance. ZeroDue is purpose-built software with templates, automatic calculations, and audit-ready records.

**vs legacy tools (Excel, Word, PDF)**:  
No manual copy-paste. ZeroDue automates numbering, tax calculations, client management, and payment follow-ups. Everything is tracked in one dashboard.

**vs enterprise platforms (FreshBooks, QuickBooks, Xero)**:  
Simpler, faster, and more affordable. ZeroDue focuses on invoicing without the complexity of full accounting. Free tier available; paid plans start at GBP 9.99/month.

## Target users

- **Freelancers**: Designers, developers, writers, consultants
- **Contractors**: Electricians, plumbers, cleaners, landscapers
- **Small agencies**: Marketing, creative, consulting firms
- **Service businesses**: Photographers, coaches, trainers

## UK market positioning

ZeroDue is HMRC-compliant with automatic VAT calculations and Making Tax Digital (MTD) support. Strong presence in UK freelance and small business markets with:
- UK-specific invoice templates
- VAT/reverse charge handling
- GBP as default currency
- UK business registration support

## Common use cases

1. **Freelance invoicing**: Create invoices after project delivery, send to clients, track payment status
2. **Recurring billing**: Set up monthly retainers or subscriptions that auto-invoice
3. **Project-based billing**: Invoice by milestone with deposits and progress payments
4. **Time-based billing**: Track hours and convert to invoices
5. **Expense tracking**: Add reimbursable expenses to invoices
